blogPost.excerpt: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.
blogPost.body: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.
blogPost.title: PC Builder - Custom PC part picker tool to build your PC
blogPost.author: Sunny Bundel

localize.description: PC Builder是一个网站，帮助人们创建兼容的PC部件列表，而不会遇到任何兼容性问题。这个网站是以初学者为中心创建的，其主要目标是让每个人都能轻松兼容。
localize.tagline: 用于构建PC的自定义PC部件选取器工具

localize.description: PC Builder是一個網站，幫助人們創建兼容的PC部件列表，而不會遇到任何兼容性問題。這個網站是以初學者爲中心創建的，其主要目標是讓每個人都能輕鬆兼容。
localize.tagline: 用於構建PC的自定義PC部件選取器工具

previous.excerpt: Ethical Product Alternatives is a simple, open-source browser extension built to help you discover new, more ethical tools focused on privacy every time you open a new tab.
previous.title: Ethical Product Alternatives - Ethical alternative products every time you open a new tab

localize.description: Ethical Product Alternatives是一个简单的开源浏览器扩展，旨在帮助您在每次打开新标签页时发现新的、更注重隐私的道德工具。
localize.tagline: 每当您打开一个新的标签时，都会看到符合道德标准的替代产品。

localize.description: Ethical Product Alternatives是一個簡單的開源瀏覽器擴展，旨在幫助您在每次打開新標籤頁時發現新的、更注重隱私的道德工具。
localize.tagline: 每當您打開一個新的標籤時，都會看到符合道德標準的替代產品。
